title: Quarkus CLI adding extension fails with white space
body:
### Describe the bug

Quarkus CLI adding extension fails when the extension name has a white space:

```
quarkus create app org.acme:movie-plays-consumer \
    --extension=kafka, jackson \
    --no-code
```



### Expected behavior

It should add the extensions

### Actual behavior

Gets an exception:

```
quarkus create app org.acme:movie-plays-consumer \
    --extension=kafka, jackson \
    --no-code
[ERROR] ‚ùó  Unable to create project: Unmatched argument at index 4: 'jackson'
```

### How to Reproduce?

quarkus create app org.acme:movie-plays-consumer \
    --extension=kafka, jackson \
    --no-code
